isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - HEATER AND AIR CONDITIONER - DESCRIPTION - Heater Bunk W/PRO SLEEPER W/Thermostat Temperature Control

svcproc.title: Heater Bunk W/PRO SLEEPER W/Thermostat Temperature Control
svcproc.para: The bunk heater system provides a blower system in the bunk to circulate heat, cooling, and air circulation. Off, low, medium or high speed is selectable from the bunk. The thermostat temperature control allows the occupant of the sleeper to select a temperature. The thermostat will then automatically regulate operation of the cooling system to maintain the selected temperature.
